com.ftdi.j2xx.interfaces

Interface SpiMaster

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FT_4222_Spi_Master

    public interface SpiMaster

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int init(int ioLine, int clock, int cpol, int cpha, byte ssoMap)
      Initialize the device as an SPI master.
      int multiReadWrite(byte[] readBuffer, byte[] writeBuffer, int singleWriteBytes, int multiWriteBytes, int multiReadBytes, int[] sizeOfRead)
      Under SPI dual or quad mode, write data to and read data from an SPI slave.

      Under SPI single mode, full-duplex write data to and read data from an SPI slave.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        int init(int ioLine,
       int clock,
       int cpol,
       int cpha,
       byte ssoMap)
        Initialize the device as an SPI master.
        Parameters:
        ioLine - SPI transmission lines
        clock - Clock divider
        cpol - Clock polarity
        cpha - Clock phase
        ssoMap - Slave selection output pins
        Returns:
        0 if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.

      • reset

        int reset()
        Reset the SPI master device.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.

      • setLines

        int setLines(int spiMode)
        Switch the SPI master to single, dual, or quad lines.
        Parameters:
        spiMode - SPI mode could be: SPI_IO_SINGLE , SPI_IO_DUAL, SPI_IO_QUAD
        Returns:
        0 if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.

      • singleWrite

        int singleWrite(byte[] writeBuffer,
              int sizeToTransfer,
              int[] sizeTransferred,
              boolean isEndTransaction)
        Under SPI single mode, write data to an SPI slave.
        Parameters:
        writeBuffer - buffer that contains the data to be written to the device.
        sizeToTransfer - The size of read and write buffer. They must be the same.
        sizeTransferred - Pointer to a variable of type uint16 which receives the number of bytes read and written to the device.
        isEndTransaction - TRUE to raise the pin of SS at the end of the transaction
        Returns:
        0 if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.

      • singleRead

        int singleRead(byte[] readBuffer,
             int sizeToTransfer,
             int[] sizeOfRead,
             boolean isEndTransaction)
        Under SPI single mode, read data from an SPI slave.
        Parameters:
        readBuffer - buffer that receives the data from the device
        sizeToTransfer - The size of read and write buffer. They must be the same.
        sizeTransferred - Pointer to a variable of type uint16 which receives the number of bytes read and written to the device.
        isEndTransaction - TRUE to raise the pin of SS at the end of the transaction
        Returns:
        0 if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.

      • singleReadWrite

        int singleReadWrite(byte[] readBuffer,
                  byte[] writeBuffer,
                  int sizeToTransfer,
                  int[] sizeTransferred,
                  boolean isEndTransaction)
        Under SPI single mode, full-duplex write data to and read data from an SPI slave.
        Parameters:
        readBuffer - buffer that receives the data from the device
        writeBuffer - buffer that contains the data to be written to the device.
        sizeToTransfer - The size of read and write buffer. They must be the same.
        sizeTransferred - Pointer to a variable of type uint16 which receives the number of bytes read and written to the device.
        isEndTransaction - TRUE to raise the pin of SS at the end of the transaction
        Returns:
        0 if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.

      • multiReadWrite

        int multiReadWrite(byte[] readBuffer,
                 byte[] writeBuffer,
                 int singleWriteBytes,
                 int multiWriteBytes,
                 int multiReadBytes,
                 int[] sizeOfRead)
        Under SPI dual or quad mode, write data to and read data from an SPI slave.
        Parameters:
        readBuffer - buffer that receives the data from the device.
        writeBuffer - buffer that contains the data to be written to the device. .
        singleWriteBytes - number of bytes in writeBuffer will be written as single-line.
        multiWriteBytes - number of bytes in writeBuffer will be written as multi-line.
        multiReadBytes - number of bytes to read as multi-line.
        sizeOfRead - number of bytes read from the device.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.
